body:
Hey guys! As you know I recently left Minecraft to produce music, so I'll be posting any songs here. 

Max and I finished our first remix of Air by Nilex. http://youtu.be/EbLTq5h851g

If you don't like any songs that's fine, but leave a comment saying why you dislike it, not just "-1 worst song my grandma makes better music." 

Thanks !! <3
body_tagged:

title: Smit's Music Hub

replies.body: With this kind of music, you will get really far. Keep it up Smit!
replies.body_tagged: With this kind of music, you will get really far. Keep it up Smit!

replies.body: I only listen to john cena and alluha akbar music make some of that.
replies.body_tagged: I only listen to john cena and alluha akbar music make some of that.

replies.body: Amazing, keep up the great work Smit and you'll go really far! :)
replies.body_tagged: Amazing, keep up the great work Smit and you'll go really far! :)

replies.body: Nice music! My only suggestion would be to maybe lower the master volume a bit when editing. It can hear distortion the sounds like the track clipping.
replies.body_tagged: Nice music! My only suggestion would be to maybe lower the master volume a bit when editing. It can hear distortion the sounds like the track clipping.

replies.body: Great music! I'm going to listen to this a lot from what I can tell (and your other future releases). Keep it up!
replies.body_tagged: Great music! I'm going to listen to this a lot from what I can tell (and your other future releases). Keep it up!

replies.body:
Some questions:

1. What DAW do you use?
2. What genres will you orient around in the future?
3. Will you consider submitting to Tasty, NCS, or Monstercat?

Also, it's nice to see a fellow producer here. Only issue with me is I don't take production seriously :P
replies.body_tagged:
Some questions:

1. What DAW do you use?
2. What genres will you orient around in the future?
3. Will you consider submitting to Tasty, NCS, or Monstercat?

Also, it's nice to see a fellow producer here. Only issue with me is I don't take production seriously :P

replies.body:
1. I use FL Studios.
2. I am planning to go more towards trap, but I like some dubstep occasionally.
3. It depends on the genre, but probably channels more like Trap City or Trap Nation.

I didn't know you produced :)
